title: Kyle Kuzma and the Brooklyn Netstravaganza
description:
Kyle Kuzma drops by the pod to talk about everything from fashion, to his young Wizards team, to his time with the Lakers. He's a bucket and one of the most daring dressers in the league. Next... There's just so much to unpack here. The guys break down Steve Nash's tenure and "mutual" firing, then get into what it will mean for this team to onboard the currently-suspended Ime Udoka as the new head coach... and THEN get into last night's disastrous loss to the Bulls. Oh, and we also have an outrageous voicemail you need to hear. BIG SHOW, Pull up. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
